markdown: | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Pirate_01 | guid = 54864f82-a489-4a1e-a5f5-8ab28a28caca }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Dessiral asked me to track down [Lord Admiral Imp](/lordAdmiralImp/), the one-mascot of the ship, the ''Firebrand'', and kill him. ## Walkthrough * Lord Admiral Imp, found lurking around the docks to the east of [The Wild Mare](/theWildMare/) in [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/). He has two [Xaurip champion](/xauripChampionDeadfire/)s and [skirmishers](/xauripSkirmisherDeadfire/) with him. The champions are low-level Paladins with Lay of Hands and the skirmishers are archers with no useful abilities. Lord Imp himself appears to be a rogue, all round a really easy fight. * Once he's dead, take his head, a [Torc of Intellect](/torcOfIntellect/), a unique ring [Ibis](/ibis/), and a curious [map fragment](/lordAdmiralImpsMapFragment/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Pirate_01.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Dessiral asked me to track down Lord Admiral Imp, the once-mascot of the ship the Firebrand, and kill him. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Lord Admiral Imp.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Search Queen's Berth, kill Lord Admiral Imp, and take his head. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | Lord Admiral Imp is slain, but I need to collect his head for Dessiral as proof of his demise. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Dessiral.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Return to Dessiral at Radiant Court in Dunnage and claim the bounty on Lord Admiral Imp. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I killed Lord Admiral Imp and claimed the bounty reward from Dessiral. |}
raw: {{Infobox quest poe2 | name = Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp | image = PE2 Lord Admiral Imp.png | caption = | added_in = poe2 | quest_type = Bounty | quest_region = Neketaka - Queen's Berth | quest_level = 8 | faction = | locations = Queen's Berth | main_npcs = Lord Admiral Imp | quest_giver = Dessiral | xp_amount = 450 | xp_type = Normal | xp_level = 8 | xp_weights = 1;1 | rewardname1 = Complete the bounty | reward1 = [[Ibis]];[[Torc of Intellect]];[[Lord Admiral Imp's Map Fragment]];{{cp2|1700}} | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Pirate_01 | guid = 54864f82-a489-4a1e-a5f5-8ab28a28caca }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire quests#Bounties|bounty]] in {{poe2}}. ==Synopsis== Dessiral asked me to track down [[Lord Admiral Imp]], the one-mascot of the ship, the ''Firebrand'', and kill him. ==Walkthrough== * Lord Admiral Imp, found lurking around the docks to the east of [[The Wild Mare]] in [[Queen's Berth]]. He has two [[Xaurip champion (Deadfire)|Xaurip champion]]s and [[Xaurip skirmisher (Deadfire)|skirmishers]] with him. The champions are low-level Paladins with Lay of Hands and the skirmishers are archers with no useful abilities. Lord Imp himself appears to be a rogue, all round a really easy fight. * Once he's dead, take his head, a [[Torc of Intellect]], a unique ring [[Ibis]], and a curious [[Lord Admiral Imp's Map Fragment|map fragment]]. ==Journal== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Pirate_01.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Dessiral asked me to track down Lord Admiral Imp, the once-mascot of the ship the Firebrand, and kill him. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Lord Admiral Imp.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Search Queen's Berth, kill Lord Admiral Imp, and take his head. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | Lord Admiral Imp is slain, but I need to collect his head for Dessiral as proof of his demise. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Dessiral.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Return to Dessiral at Radiant Court in Dunnage and claim the bounty on Lord Admiral Imp. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I killed Lord Admiral Imp and claimed the bounty reward from Dessiral. |}
